law.catch_line: Written approval of application by local agency.
law.text: All applications made to the authority shall be subject to written approval by a local development corporation, local development agency, or in the absence thereof, approval by a local governmental body.
law.history: Amended 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 201, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1986. -- Created 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 340, sec. 22, effective July 15, 1980.
